Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As I thought, the further we go, the more the Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Not wise to enact exactly what they intended us to.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Though corrupted, they are still only normal mechanoids. Their sensors still only consist of visual scanning devices.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we can weave through them, we can avoid combat.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Everyone, sheathe your weapons. Use their blind spots to go deeper into the ruins.', 4: '1'}
